meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: a State specified in column 1 of Part 1 of the Schedule is a Contracting State; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: a State specified in column 1 of Part 2 of the Schedule is a Contracting State in respect of the corresponding territorial unit or units specified in column 2 of Part 2 of the Schedule.

subsection.content: The date of the coming into effect of the Convention (as defined in section 20A(1) of the Ordinance) between Hong Kong and a State specified in column 1 of the Schedule is the date set out opposite to that State in column 2 of Part 1 or column 3 of Part 2 (as the case may be) of the Schedule. (L.N. 5 of 2008)
